pscontrols documentation

PSControls

A modern TypeScript UI Framework with React capabilities

ðŸŽ¯ Quick Start

Example :
# Build PSControls
npm run build:legacy

# Deploy to environments
npm run deploy

# Generate documentation  
npm run compodoc

ðŸ“¦ Usage in Your Applications

Example :
<!-- Include PSControls -->
<script src="vrcontrols.all.min.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="vrcontrols.all.min.css">

<script>
// Create controls with familiar API
vr.createButton({ text: "Save", mode: vr.ButtonModeEnum.Primary });
vr.createGrid({ dataSource: data, columns: [...] });
vr.createDatePicker({ format: "dd/MM/yyyy" });
</script>

ðŸš€ Modern Build System

PSControls uses a clean, modern Webpack-based build system with all obsolete Grunt dependencies removed:

  • âš¡ Fast builds: ~6-8 seconds (65% faster than Grunt)
  • ðŸ§¹ Clean dependencies* 159+ obsolete packages removed
  • ðŸŽ¯ Same API* 100% backward compatibility guaranteed
  • ðŸ“Š Better debugging* Source maps and modern tooling

See docs/CLEAN_BUILD_SYSTEM.md for full documentation.

ðŸ”§ Available Commands

Command Purpose
npm run build:legacy Main PSControls build (replaces grunt)
npm run deploy Deploy to configured environments
npm run build:all Build all variants
npm run compodoc Generate documentation

ðŸ“– Documentation

  • Clean Build System - Modern build documentation
  • Architecture Analysis - Framework architecture
  • React Migration - React integration guide
  • Issues & Solutions - Common problems and fixes

âœ¨ Features

  • 30+ UI Controls: Button, Grid, DatePicker, ComboBox, and more
  • TypeScript: Full type safety and IntelliSense support
  • jQuery Integration: Familiar jQuery-based API
  • React Ready: Optional React components available
  • Internationalization: Built-in i18n support (React components)
  • Accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance (React components)
